alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:22PM EDT until August 20 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LEWIS COUNTY... At 622 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highmarket, or 7 miles northwest of Boonville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Highmarket, Lyonsdale, Port Leyden, Lyons Falls, Constableville, Turin, Mohawk Hill, Swancott Mill, West Leyden and Talcottville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
